articles.description: Children are at risk of acquiring coronavirus infection immediately after birth.Pregnant women also have to exercise extreme caution in maintain social distancing even with family members
articles.content:
NEW DELHI :
If you have been planning to get pregnant, now is certainly not the time to do so as pregnant women and infant children are at a high risk of contracting COVID-19, says a doctor speciali… [+2877 chars]

articles.content: Earlier this month, the UKs Oxford University was one of the first in the world to trial a vaccination - and with over 1,000 immunisations, they are now ready to move to their next phase of testing. … [+795 chars]
